title.en: Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun: Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?

ニトの怠惰な異世界症候群 ～最弱職＜ヒーラー＞なのに最強はチートですか？～

Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun: Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?

altTitles.en: A NEET’s Guide to the Parallel World
A NEET’s Guide to the Parallel World: Healer, the Strongest Cheat?
Nito’s Guide to the Parallel World
Nito’s Guide to the Parallel World: Healer, the Strongest Cheat?

altTitles.ru: Синдром ленивого Нито, в ином мире

altTitles.zh: 尼特的慵懒异世界症候群

description.en:
Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates. 

- Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/194415/)
description.fr: Hidako Masamune est un lycéen qui est continuellement harcelé, brimé par ses camarades de classe. Lassé de tout cela, il décide de se suicider, mais il est transporté dans un autre monde avec tous ses camarades de classe. À leur arrivée, ils découvrent qu'ils possèdent désormais des capacités étonnantes, lui en revanche, n'a obtenu que le statut de "guérisseur", la plus faible de toutes les compétences. Le roi décide de se débarrasser de lui en le transportant dans un autre lieu éloigné, mais pas avant que Hidako ne jure de se venger contre le roi, le royaume et tous ses camarades de classe.
description.pt-br: Hidako Masamune é um estudante do ensino médio que sofre bullying constante por seus colegas de classe. Ficando cansado de tudo, ele decide se matar, mas ao invés disso ele é transportado para outro mundo junto com seus colegas de classe. Quando ele chega, ele os encontra em posse de excelentes habilidades, mas ele foi o único que ganhou a classe de “healer”, a classe mais fraca de todas. O rei decide transportá-lo para outro lugar bem longe, mas não antes de Hidako jurar vingança contra o rei, o reino, e todos os seus colegas de classe.
